mapper.select:
select a.id, b.type_name, a.name, c.shop_name, a.memo, a.valid, a.price, a.date_create from scs_dish_info a join scs_dish_type b on a.dish_type=b.id join scs_shop c on a.shop_fk=c.id where a.valid = 1
and name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name},'%')
and shop_fk IN (SELECT id FROM scs_shop WHERE shop_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shop_name},'%'))
and dish_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dish_type},'%')
